summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 21835, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 8th Avenue South, from Judkins Street to Addition Street, in the City of Seattle, and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property therefor, and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law", approved on September 22, 1909; directing the Corporation Counsel to dismiss Cause No. 87946, of the Superior Court instituted upon said ordinance and providing for the payment of costs.
